mapper.select: SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectSurveyListCnt*/ COUNT(a.cxstn_srv_seq) FROM cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq

choose.when: AND ( INSTR(A.REG_ID, #{q}) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(NAME, #{q}) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(MOD_ID, #{q}) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(NAME, #{q}) > 0) )
choose.otherwise: AND ( INSTR(a.part_cmpn_nm_1, #{q}) > 0 OR INSTR(a.part_cmpn_cd_1, #{q}) > 0 OR INSTR(a.part_cmpn_nm_2, #{q}) > 0 OR INSTR(a.part_cmpn_cd_2, #{q}) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(NAME, #{q}) > 0) OR INSTR(a.MOD_ID, #{q}) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(NAME, #{q}) > 0) )

mapper.select: select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectSurveyDtl */ a.cxstn_srv_seq , a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , b.year , b.episd , a.part_cmpn_nm_1 , a.part_cmpn_cd_1 , a.part_cmpn_nm_2 , a.part_cmpn_cd_2 , a.rprsnt_nm , a.bsnm_reg_no , a.pic_nm , a.tel_no , a.email , b.srv_seq , (select titl from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as titl , a.srv_rspn_seq , a.crtfn_no , a.ptcpt_cd , a.cmpltn_yn , a.ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm , a.score , a.send_dtm , a.reg_id , a.reg_ip , a.reg_dtm , a.mod_id , a.mod_ip , a.mod_dtm from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq where a.cxstn_srv_seq = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdListCnt*/ COUNT(a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq) FROM cx_cmpn_episd_mst a inner join sv_mst b on a.srv_seq = b.srv_seq
where a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = #{cxstnCmpnEpisdSeq}

SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectCxstnEpisdListCnt*/ COUNT(a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq) FROM cx_cmpn_episd_mst a inner join cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq
where a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = #{cxstnCmpnEpisdSeq}
SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdMst */ cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq FROM cx_cmpn_episd_mst WHERE year=#{year} and episd = #{episd}

select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdSurveyList */ a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , a.year , a.episd , a.srv_seq , b.titl , (select count(cxstn_srv_seq) from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst where cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq and ifnull(srv_rspn_seq,0) > 0 ) as rspn_cnt from cx_cmpn_episd_mst a inner join sv_mst b on a.srv_seq = b.srv_seq order by a.year , a.episd asc
mapper.delete: delete /* WBLSurveyMstSearchDTO.deleteSurveyRspn */ sv_rspn_mst , sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl , sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl from sv_rspn_mst left join sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl on sv_rspn_mst.srv_rspn_seq = sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl.srv_rspn_seq left join sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl on sv_rspn_mst.srv_rspn_seq = sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl.srv_rspn_seq where sv_rspn_mst.srv_rspn_seq = #{srvRspnSeq}
mapper.update: update /* WBLSurveyMstInsertDTO.updateSurveyRspn */ cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst set ptcpt_cd = 'E' , cmpltn_yn = 'N' , score = 0 , ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm = null , srv_rspn_seq = null , mod_id = #{modId} , mod_ip = #{modIp} , mod_dtm = now() where cxstn_srv_seq = #{cxstnSrvSeq}
mapper.select: select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectFrontSurveyList */ a.cxstn_srv_seq , a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , b.year , b.episd , a.part_cmpn_nm_1 , a.part_cmpn_cd_1 , a.part_cmpn_nm_2 , a.part_cmpn_cd_2 , a.rprsnt_nm , a.bsnm_reg_no , a.pic_nm , a.tel_no , a.email , b.srv_seq , (select titl from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as titl , (select rspn_mm from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as rspn_mm , (select count(srv_seq) from sv_qstn_dtl where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as qstn_cnt , (select cntn from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as cntn , a.srv_rspn_seq , a.crtfn_no , a.ptcpt_cd , a.cmpltn_yn , a.ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm , a.score , a.reg_id , a.reg_ip , a.reg_dtm , a.mod_id , a.mod_ip , a.mod_dtm from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq where a.crtfn_no = #{detailsKey}
mapper.update: update /* WBLSurveyMapper.updateNoSurvey */ cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst set ptcpt_cd = 'N' , cmpltn_yn = 'Y' , ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm = now() where cxstn_srv_seq = #{cxstnSrvSeq}
mapper.select: select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectFrontSurveyDtl */ a.cxstn_srv_seq , a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , b.year , b.episd , a.part_cmpn_nm_1 , a.part_cmpn_cd_1 , a.part_cmpn_nm_2 , a.part_cmpn_cd_2 , a.rprsnt_nm , a.bsnm_reg_no , a.pic_nm , a.tel_no , a.email , b.srv_seq , (select titl from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as titl , (select rspn_mm from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as rspn_mm , (select count(srv_seq) from sv_qstn_dtl where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as qstn_cnt , (select cntn from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as cntn , a.srv_rspn_seq , a.crtfn_no , a.ptcpt_cd , a.cmpltn_yn , a.ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm , a.score , a.reg_id , a.reg_ip , a.reg_dtm , a.mod_id , a.mod_ip , a.mod_dtm from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq where a.cxstn_srv_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.update: update /* WBLSurveyMapper.updateSendDtm */ cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst set send_dtm = now() where cxstn_srv_seq = #{cxstnSrvSeq}
